Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed to meet your needs and exceed your expectations. This exceptional item carries a value of $8000 to me, reflecting its high-quality craftsmanship, unique features, and the dedication of our team behind it. Considering its unparalleled benefits and capabilities, I am extending an exclusive opportunity for you to acquire this masterpiece at the same price point. Please let me know if you're interested in exploring the possibilities this product can bring to you. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $8,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $8,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $12,000
